title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.42 - Book inventory
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.42 - Book inventory

State Regulations
(a) An
inventory which is not the result of actual stocktaking but of adding the units
and the cost of incoming goods to previous inventory figures and deducting the
units and cost of outgoing goods. (b) The balances of materials or products on
hand in quantities, dollars, or both, appearing in perpetual-inventory
accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.42

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
